mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_category_mapping (engin_name, engin, item_category, at_id) VALUES (#{enginName}, #{engin}, #{itemCategory}, #{atId})
mapper.update: UPDATE item_category_mapping SET6 engin_name = #{enginName}, engin = #{engin}, item_category = #{itemCategory}, at_id = #{atId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT icm.engin, CONCAT(icm.item_category, ' [', (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT at_id ORDER BY at_id ASC SEPARATOR ',') FROM item_category_mapping WHERE item_category = icm.item_category), ']') AS item_category, SUM(dr.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM depository_record dr JOIN item_category_mapping icm ON dr.at_id = icm.at_id WHERE dr.apply_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND dr.state = '已出库' GROUP BY icm.item_category, icm.engin
